verses.verse: The plans <S%H4633><s%> of the heart <S%H3820><s%> belong to man, <S%H120><s%> but the answer <S%H4617><s%> of the tongue <S%H3956><s%> is from Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
All the ways <S%H1870><s%> of a man <S%H376><s%> are clean <S%H2134><s%> in his own eyes; <S%H5869><s%> but Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> weighs <S%H8505><s%> the motives. <S%H7307><s%>
Commit <S%H1556><s%> your deeds <S%H4639><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and your plans <S%H4284><s%> shall succeed. <S%H3559><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has made <S%H6466><s%> everything for its own end <S%H4617><s%>â€” yes, <S%H7563><s%> even the wicked for the day <S%H3117><s%> of evil. <S%H7563><s%>
Everyone who is proud <S%H1362><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> they shall <S%H3027><s%> certainly <S%H3027><s%> not be unpunished. <S%H5352><s%>
By mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> is atoned <S%H3722><s%> for. <S%H3374><s%> By the fear of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> men depart <S%H5493><s%> from evil. <S%H7451><s%>
When a man <S%H376><s%>'s ways <S%H1870><s%> please <S%H7521><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> he makes even his enemies <S%H341><s%> to be at peace with him. <S%H7999><s%>
Better <S%H2896><s%> is a little <S%H4592><s%> with righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> than great <S%H7230><s%> revenues <S%H8393><s%> with injustice. <S%H4941><s%>
A man <S%H120><s%>'s heart <S%H3820><s%> plans <S%H2803><s%> his course, <S%H1870><s%> but Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> directs <S%H3559><s%> his steps. <S%H6806><s%>
Inspired judgments <S%H7081><s%> are on the lips <S%H8193><s%> of the king. <S%H4428><s%> He shall <S%H4941><s%> not betray <S%H4603><s%> his mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
Honest <S%H4941><s%> balances <S%H3976><s%> and scales <S%H6425><s%> are Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s; all the weights <S%H68><s%> in the bag <S%H3599><s%> are his work. <S%H4639><s%>
It is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> for kings <S%H4428><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> wrong, <S%H7562><s%> for the throne <S%H3678><s%> is established <S%H3559><s%> by righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>
Righteous <S%H6664><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%> are the delight <S%H7522><s%> of kings. <S%H4428><s%> They value <S%H157><s%> one who speaks <S%H1696><s%> the truth. <S%H3477><s%>
The king <S%H4428><s%>'s wrath <S%H2534><s%> is a messenger <S%H4397><s%> of death, <S%H4194><s%> but a wise <S%H2450><s%> man <S%H376><s%> will pacify it. <S%H3722><s%>
In the light <S%H216><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>'s face <S%H6440><s%> is life. <S%H2416><s%> His favor <S%H6440><s%> is like a cloud <S%H5645><s%> of the spring rain. <S%H4456><s%>

How much better <S%H2896><s%> it is to get <S%H7069><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> than gold! <S%H2742><s%> Yes, <S%H7069><s%> to get understanding <S%H998><s%> is to be chosen <S%H977><s%> rather than silver. <S%H3701><s%>

The highway <S%H4546><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> is to depart <S%H5493><s%> from evil. <S%H7451><s%> He who keeps <S%H5341><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%> preserves <S%H8104><s%> his soul. <S%H5315><s%>
Pride <S%H1347><s%> goes before <S%H6440><s%> destruction, <S%H7667><s%> and a haughty <S%H1363><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> a fall. <S%H3783><s%>
It is better <S%H2896><s%> to be of a lowly <S%H6035><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> with the poor, <S%H8217><s%> than to divide <S%H2505><s%> the plunder <S%H7998><s%> with the proud. <S%H1343><s%>
He who heeds <S%H7919><s%> the Word <S%H1697><s%> finds <S%H4672><s%> prosperity. <S%H2896><s%> Whoever trusts <S%H982><s%> in Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is blessed. <S%H835><s%>

The wise <S%H2450><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> shall be called <S%H7121><s%> prudent. <S%H995><s%> Pleasantness <S%H4986><s%> of the lips <S%H8193><s%> promotes <S%H3254><s%> instruction. <S%H3948><s%>
Understanding <S%H7922><s%> is a fountain <S%H4726><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%> to one who has <S%H1167><s%> it, <S%H4148><s%> but the punishment of fools <S%H191><s%> is their folly. <S%H200><s%>
The heart <S%H3820><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> instructs <S%H7919><s%> his mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and adds <S%H3254><s%> learning <S%H3948><s%> to his lips. <S%H8193><s%>
Pleasant <S%H5278><s%> words <S%H561><s%> are a honeycomb, <S%H6688><s%> sweet <S%H4966><s%> to the soul, <S%H5315><s%> and health <S%H4832><s%> to the bones. <S%H6106><s%>
There is <S%H3426><s%> a way <S%H1870><s%> which seems right <S%H3477><s%> to <S%H6440><s%> a man, <S%H376><s%> but in the end <S%H319><s%> it leads <S%H1870><s%> to death. <S%H4194><s%>
The appetite of the laboring <S%H6001><s%> man <S%H5315><s%> labors <S%H6001><s%> for him; <S%H6310><s%> for his mouth urges him on. <S%H404><s%>
A worthless <S%H1100><s%> man <S%H376><s%> devises <S%H3738><s%> mischief. <S%H7451><s%> His speech <S%H8193><s%> is like a scorching <S%H6867><s%> fire. <S%H784><s%>
A perverse <S%H8419><s%> man <S%H376><s%> stirs <S%H7971><s%> up strife. <S%H4066><s%> A whisperer <S%H5372><s%> separates <S%H6504><s%> close friends. <S%H441><s%>
A man <S%H376><s%> of violence <S%H2555><s%> entices <S%H6601><s%> his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> and leads <S%H3212><s%> him in a way <S%H1870><s%> that is not good. <S%H2896><s%>

One who winks <S%H6095><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> to plot <S%H2803><s%> perversities, <S%H8419><s%> one who compresses <S%H7169><s%> his lips, <S%H8193><s%> is bent <S%H3615><s%> on <S%H3615><s%> evil. <S%H7451><s%>
Gray hair <S%H7872><s%> is a crown <S%H5850><s%> of glory. <S%H8597><s%> It is attained <S%H4672><s%> by a life <S%H1870><s%> of righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

One who is slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than the mighty; <S%H1368><s%> one who rules <S%H4910><s%> his spirit, <S%H7307><s%> than he who takes <S%H3920><s%> a city. <S%H5892><s%>
The lot <S%H1486><s%> is cast <S%H2904><s%> into the lap, <S%H2436><s%> but its every decision <S%H4941><s%> is from Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
